attributes.action: uk tax payers have I an incapacity / disability
attributes.additional_details: GOV. YOU NEED TO STOP SPECIALISTS EASE TO COMMIT PERJURY.  I was denied right to defend myself in court. footage (heavily edited to deceive) & statements prove my ex solicitor, specialists and defence committed perjury. gov. departments NHS (pre court) & DWP (post court ,I offered footage & skeleton statement ) physically examined me & diagnosed me with complex regional pain syndrome. you do not need to be a medic to see thigh area permanently swollen. I cannot tense this muscle, it is where I suffer most pains. I have sent you footage, statements & wrote but you refuse to answer do I not have the right to defend myself & should the DWP request G4S send unedited footage so they can conclusively decide who has robbed the public purse. footage (with text) is on line uk tax payers have I an incapacity / disability 1 & 2.
